rules_text:
Trample
[i]Urvan[/i] – When Greil, Mercenary Captain enters, destroy target nonland permanent.
[i]Greil Mercenary[/i] – Whenever Greil, Mercenary Captain attacks, create two 1/1 red Mercenary creature tokens with “{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”
